website_summaries.verdict: Though basic, this affordable tote is well made, comes in a variety of color options, and is attractive and spacious.
pros: A spacious (22-inches by 16-inches), heavy-duty canvas bag that's also attractive and suitable for numerous uses, from trips to the beach to shopping
cons: It doesn't have the structure to stand on its own or as many pockets as some competitors
But these issues aren't likely to concern you if price and space are your top priorities

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is large and roomy! It is well made and strong. My 16 year old son decided to test the strength of this by carrying around my 3 year old granddaughter in it. No rips, tears or popped stitching. It was roomy enough she claimed it as her "princess castle" for most of the day and stayed in it leaving only to get toys to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: These totes are awesome. You can't beat the price. The fabric is heavy duty, the zipper at the top is great, and there is a nice size pocket on the front you could fit a cell phone, wallet, and keys. The inside space is huge. It is just 1 large open compartment, no inside pockets. In my bag I was able to fit 4 pairs of sweat pants (medium thickness), 5 shirts, under garments, a pair of flip flops and slippers, a bathroom bag (10x6x4in), and a small bag filled with snacks. I still have space left in it! This bag is exactly as advertised, nothing fancy but works great.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, This Bag Is Terrific!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect it to be as well made and roomy as it is! Heavy canvas that looks like it will wear like iron. Love the zippered top. And soooo much room! I use it for my work tote, and it holds my lunch cooler, a sweater in case the office gets cold, and all kinds of extras if needed. And my travel cup fits in the front pocket perfectly. Exceptional product at a very reasonable price! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Richardson

customer_reviews.title: One unanswered question I had when I was shopping for ...
customer_reviews.text: One unanswered question I had when I was shopping for these was, "Are these the strong bags or the flimsy bags?" These are the really strong ones.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Although I rated sturdiness and durability 5 stars, I only gave the overall rating 4 stars because the handles are really not long enough to use as shoulder straps.
customer_reviews.author: John Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: SO STURDY! Love Love Love this canvas bag. I bought it to use on a cruise vacation and it worked great. Have since been using it as a grocery bag and it's woderful - holds a TON! Will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: So wonderful! Heavy duty. Big. Nice looking. Everyone who sees me in the store packing my bags comments and asks where I got them. Can fit a lot of food in it or for those of us with arthritis just a few things in lots of bags. They are heavy and a bit stiff to start I am considering washing in fabric softener.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Childs

customer_reviews.title: Bag can carry my 30lb Puggle :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a carrying tote for my 30lb Puggle. She doesn't fit in regular carriers because she's a little to chubby ;) but she fits in the canvas tote perfectly! So, if you're on the edge and wonder if this bag will be able to support the weight of your items, I can vouch that it most definitely can!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle easy and there is a little fraying but I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Wrinkle easy and there is a little fraying but I am really happy with them as reusable shopping bags. Don't machine wash them and you won't have problems with wrinkling.

product_meta.title: Handy Laundry Canvas Tote Beach Bag - Pockets and Shoulder Straps. (22 x 16 Inches)
product_meta.description:
When you have a lot to carry to the beach, this roomy, durable, light-weight canvas tote beach bag provides all the storage you need. Its extra-deep inside expands significantly to hold all the items necessary for a day at the beach, pool, or any outdoor event. The zippered top closure will help keep secure your cash, keys, and other items you don’t want to lose. An extra deep outside pocket is a convenient spot to put those items you have to grab quickly, like suntan lotion or sunglasses. The bag expands for extra roomy storage at 22 inches wide by 16 inches high with a 6-inch bottom support. That means you can carry numerous towels, a beach blanket, sand toys, your book, and snacks—anything you need for a fun day out at the shore or pool. Because the beach bag is made of 100 percent recycled natural 12-ounce cotton, it’s an eco-friendly option. It’s double-stitched on all seams for durability to handle the weight of wet towels and bathing suits—plus your child’s rock and shell collection for the day. Two sturdy gusset 22-inch over-the-shoulder straps allow for convenient carrying. The straps and trim are made with 600 Denier nylon and come in four different, attractive colors: red, black, navy, or royal blue trim. Don’t limit its use to the beach or pool. The tote is also perfect for overnight travel and shopping trips because it’s expandable enough to hold numerous items, large and small. It’s also lightweight enough to fold up when you’re not using it, and the material is 100 percent washable.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :22 x 6 x 16 inches; 12 Ounces
 * Item model number :5093
 * Date First Available :August 15, 2016
 * Manufacturer :Handy Laundry
 * ASIN :B00V6TFCPM

feature_bullets: Zippered top closure secures items inside and there’s an extra deep outside pocket.
Extra roomy beach canvas bag tote that’s 22" wide x 16" high with a 6-inch bottom support.
Made in USA of 100% recycled natural 12 oz. cotton in four colors for eco-friendly use.
Double-stitched bag on all seams for durability to handle wet towels and assorted beach gear.
Beach bag with two sturdy gusset 22-inch over-the-shoulder straps allow for convenient carrying.
